alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:26PM CDT until August 11 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LYON...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND NORTHERN MURRAY COUNTIES... At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Balaton, or 17 miles northwest of Slayton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 4:19 CDT trained spotters reported quarter sized hail east of Florence. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Balaton around 430 PM CDT. Lake Shetek State Park around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Tracy and Currie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
